techmeme.title: Google makes all of its Gemini features for Workspace apps free, after previously charging $20+ per user per month, but raises the price of all Workspace plans (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Microsoft relaunches its free Copilot for businesses as Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, offering pay-as-you-go AI agents and using GPT-4o to answer queries (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Authorities in Singapore, which has a dire shortage of nurses, see the potential in AI tools to assist in preventive illness care, especially for the elderly (Reeta Raman/Rest of World)
The Philippines' decision to supercharge its online gambling sector has been disastrous, opening the door to crimes, including money laundering, in the country (Bloomberg)
OpenAI will fund the expansion of Axios to Pittsburgh, Kansas City, Boulder, and Huntsville, as part of a broader content-sharing and technology deal (Sara Fischer/Axios)
